version_description: Welcome to Sky!
Welcome to Sky!

Welcome to Sky!

This update is primarily focused on bug fixes and quality of life improvements reported by our loyal players!  We appreciate all of your bug reports and persistence in helping Sky be the best that it can be!  Read about the fixes below:

Bug Fixes
- Fixed text cropped by edge of screen on opening animation
- Fixed returning players to the end of Storm can't finish the level properly
- Fixed bug with the Darkness in Eye of Eden where sometimes it would not function as intended.
- Various terrain holes where players could fall through the world.
- Broken 8 player creature summoning shrine in Prairie
- Player couldn’t teleport to friends after a Storm Run because the farthest checkpoint was reset by accident.
- Sometimes when the server was under heavy load a player typing too fast could get the message queue stuck in a loop where no more text can be ever sent out until reboot.
- Player could accidentally see a chat dialog with a friend in Home via calling down this friend’s star image despite not having chat unlocked yet.
- Filled in various terrain holes where players could fall through the world.
- Fixed a bug in Vault that could cause a player to get stuck under the floor upon level load.
- Fixed bug with the Darkness in Eye of Eden where sometimes it would not function as intended.
- Minor sound popping fixes

Improvements
- Console quality bloom has been re-enabled and may improve performance for various devices.
- Optimized the performance of chat bubble collisions when multiple players are speaking
- Trying out an experimental energy saving scheme: one second after you bring up the keyboard to chat the game will place itself into energy saving mode. As soon as chat is hidden the game returns to the original mode.
- Added Traditional Chinese language support
- Minor Japanese translation improvements
- Credits music adjustments
- Ongoing improvements and fixes to graphical performance
- Minor cinematic timing and UI polish

Misc fixes
- The color sharpness of the teal cape has been slightly adjusted
- Additional fixes and notable mentions added to the final credits

Bug Fixes
- Fixed text cropped by edge of screen on opening animation
- Fixed returning players to the end of Storm can't finish the level properly
- Fixed bug with the Darkness in Eye of Eden where sometimes it would not function as intended.
- Various terrain holes where players could fall through the world.
- Broken 8 player creature summoning shrine in Prairie
- Player couldn’t teleport to friends after a Storm Run because the farthest checkpoint was reset by accident.
- Sometimes when the server was under heavy load a player typing too fast could get the message queue stuck in a loop where no more text can be ever sent out until reboot.
- Player could accidentally see a chat dialog with a friend in Home via calling down this friend’s star image despite not having chat unlocked yet.
- Filled in various terrain holes where players could fall through the world.
- Fixed a bug in Vault that could cause a player to get stuck under the floor upon level load.
- Fixed bug with the Darkness in Eye of Eden where sometimes it would not function as intended.
- Minor sound popping fixes

Improvements
- Console quality bloom has been re-enabled and may improve performance for various devices.
- Optimized the performance of chat bubble collisions when multiple players are speaking
- Trying out an experimental energy saving scheme: one second after you bring up the keyboard to chat the game will place itself into energy saving mode. As soon as chat is hidden the game returns to the original mode.
- Added Traditional Chinese language support
- Minor Japanese translation improvements
- Credits music adjustments
- Ongoing improvements and fixes to graphical performance
- Minor cinematic timing and UI polish

Misc fixes
- The color sharpness of the teal cape has been slightly adjusted
- Additional fixes and notable mentions added to the final credits

Hello everyone,
 
 Thanks to all of the feedback we have received from players since the release of Sky, we have made a bunch of improvements. This includes bug fixes and performance improvements to name a few things. For more information, please continue reading.
 
 Updates
 - Stars now appear around your favorite friends’ names in-game.
 - When you accept an invite, you will get a prompt to name your new friend.
 - Better messaging for when it’s not possible to join a friend’s game.
 - Added Account link button in the main menu for easier GameCenter account linking for iOS13 Beta players.
 - Players should no longer receive spam for their or their friend’s Gratitude Shrine notes.
 - Improved Manta riding.
 - The Teal cape has been made more teal.
 - Added the credits song “Constellation”.
 - Added a constellation gate behind the butterfly gate in Prairie to prevent first time player from entering it and get lost
 
 Bug fixes
 - The UI should no longer get cut off on 4" iphones.
 - Players should no longer have issues rejoining their friends in Eden.
 - Returned the Spirits missing throughout the game.
 - Resolved multiple crashes that were preventing players from progressing or entering certain levels.
 - Fixed a bug that was preventing certain purchase details in the Adventure pass menu from appearing in languages other than English.
 - Various consistency bugs have been resolved.
 
 As always, we look forward to hearing your feedback, and encourage you to join us in that discussion on our official Discord server at discord.gg/thatskygame.com!

Hello everyone,
 
 Thanks to all of the feedback we have received from players since the release of Sky, we have made a bunch of improvements. This includes bug fixes and performance improvements to name a few things. For more information, please continue reading.
 
 Updates
 - Stars now appear around your favorite friends’ names in-game.
 - When you accept an invite, you will get a prompt to name your new friend.
 - Better messaging for when it’s not possible to join a friend’s game.
 - Added Account link button in the main menu for easier GameCenter account linking for iOS13 Beta players.
 - Players should no longer receive spam for their or their friend’s Gratitude Shrine notes.
 - Improved Manta riding.
 - The Teal cape has been made more teal.
 - Added the credits song “Constellation”.
 - Added a constellation gate behind the butterfly gate in Prairie to prevent first time player from entering it and get lost
 
 Bug fixes
 - The UI should no longer get cut off on 4" iphones.
 - Players should no longer have issues rejoining their friends in Eden.
 - Returned the Spirits missing throughout the game.
 - Resolved multiple crashes that were preventing players from progressing or entering certain levels.
 - Fixed a bug that was preventing certain purchase details in the Adventure pass menu from appearing in languages other than English.
 - Various consistency bugs have been resolved.
 
 As always, we look forward to hearing your feedback, and encourage you to join us in that discussion on our official Discord server at discord.gg/thatskygame.com!

Greetings, adventurers!

We have an interim bug fix patch in preparation of the incoming new Seasonal event. Please check out the details below.


Daily Quests Addition

Daily quests are now available even when there is not an active Seasonal event. 

A new daily quest NPC with two quests each day has been added to Home for when the Season of Gratitude has ended
Completing these quests will reward you with a large amount of candlelight.


Chat Table Improvements

We have fixed the ability for players to push other players with chat tables. 


We understand that some players are also interrupting the experience in Home with these tables. We hear you, and are intending to take care of this and any other disruption of the intended experience of Sky.

Friendship Adjustments

We are working on the next iteration of our economy and additional changes are in the works. Meanwhile, in order to gift Hearts to friends, players must now have a more advanced friendship. Our intention is to discourage unfair bot farming and multi-device exploitation, as Hearts are designed to represent authentic gratefulness from one human being to another. 


General Updates


Occasional hand-holding connection issues should be drastically improved. 
Minor bug fixes, crash fixes, and tuning.


As always, we look forward to hearing your feedback, and encourage you to join us in that discussion on our official Discord server at discord.gg/thatskygame.

The Season of Lightseekers is about to begin! 
This latest season of content brings some very special surprises to the land of Sky including:
* MFi, PlayStation and Xbox controller support
* Six new spirits to meet all with new cosmetics to collect
* An umbrella to shelter you and your friends from the rain
* Multiplayer emotes like piggyback and double handed high five
* Friendship menu has grown to three tiers
* New instruments and music sheets
* New daily quests including a challenge to chase light across the world
* New spells that resets player height and recharge energy instantly

Changes & Improvements:
* Lighting a friend’s star in the constellation now sends a partial heart instead of candle
* Improved to block / unblock friend UI
* Updated account panel in the settings menu allowing you to link your game with your Game Center and / or Google account
* Most emotes and instruments can be used while running and piggybacking
* Crab can be heated up
* Quest spirit ball mechanics improved
* Heat and performance optimizations

Bugs:
* Fixed handheld dropping via poor network connection 
* Gate, dark plants, creatures, moving platform networking stalls fixed
* Candle light pick up loss is fixed
* Occasional spirit collect failure fixed 
* Numerous other bug fixes and small improvements

One more thing:
A secret new area to discover with others over time

For more information, check out the detailed patch notes here: http://bit.ly/sky-patchnotes 
Let us know your feedback on our official Discord server: https://discord.gg/thatskygame

Greetings Adventurers!

This update is primarily focused on bug fixes and quality of life improvements reported by our loyal players!  We appreciate all of your bug reports and persistence in helping Sky be the best that it can be!  Read about the fixes below:

Bug Fixes
- Season intro cutscene in Home will play properly now if haven’t seen yet
- Portals in Home will now open properly after Eden
- The 1st heart in top right currency UI will show up properly now
- The Shout spirits will now not require going back to the temple if someone else triggered them
- Fixed a number of bugs with size and chibi mask
- Black sphere will no longer appear from the Isle of Dawn temple
- Fixed a button not showing up to summon Oreo
- Screenshot pixelation glitch is now fixed
- Fixed crash happening after in app purchases for certain players with lots of progress


Improvements
- Added hint to rise button in Dawn tutorial after first cave
- Collecting Season Spirits will now be available in Home constellation immediately after completing their quest

Misc fixes
- Made ultimate umbrella colors glow a bit more
- Minor level tweaks and improvements

Welcome to the Season of Belonging! A family is scattered across the world and needs your help to reunite them with each other. This season includes:
- Spirits to discover with quests, expressions and cosmetics
- Guitars!
- A whole new level in Forest
- Bug fixes

For more information, check out the detailed patch notes here: http://bit.ly/sky-patchnotes
Let us know your feedback on our official Discord server: https://discord.gg/thatskygame

Hello, Sky adventurers!

Thanks to the Community’s help in reporting bugs and issues, we made some updates and tackled a few issues from the weekend:
- Fixed a bug where the Valley of Triumph and Golden Wasteland Seasonal spirits were floating in the air.
- Fixed the issue of missing candles in Vault of Knowledge.
- Reverted a previously patched out-of-bounds area in Isle of Dawn that was a fan favorite.

For more details: http://bit.ly/sky-patchnotes

Follow us to get news and updates:
- Facebook/Twitter/Instagram/Discord: @thatskygame
- YouTube/Twitch: @thatgamecompany

- Bug fixes & improvements

This update includes:
- Gratitude Fur Cape Pack will be retiring when the season concludes
- Bug fixes

For more details: http://bit.ly/sky-patchnotes

Hot Bug Fixes:
*Fixed the overheating problem. Now the performance should be back to normal.
*Now tapping on your self will reveal players you know, and the "Warp" feature should work like usual.
*Flower Hair Accessory causes the items carried on the back to flip.
*Player can't tap on gates and gears when strangers are standing nearby.

Hot Bug Fixes:
*Fixed the overheating problem. Now the performance should be back to normal.
*Now tapping on your self will reveal players you know, and the "Warp" feature should work like usual.
*Flower Hair Accessory causes the items carried on the back to flip.
*Player can't tap on gates and gears when strangers are standing nearby.

Greetings, adventurers!

The final quest to restore the Forgotten Ark will be available on June 11th. Complete all six quests to unlock the final cutscene.

Celebrate Days of Rainbow beginning June 10th. Can you find the rainbows hidden in each level?

This update includes:
- New content
- Bug fixes
- Performance improvements

For more details: http://bit.ly/sky-patchnotes

Greetings, adventurers!

Welcome to the Season of Sanctuary! Spirits are seeking an island retreat in a new Daylight Prairie island. Join them for some relaxation and sightseeing.
 
Pre-order the "Season of Sanctuary" Adventure Pass and receive 10 bonus Seasonal Candles.
 
This update includes:
 - New content
 - Bug fixes
 
 For more details: http://bit.ly/sky-patchnotes
 
 Follow us to get news and updates:
